La double authentification (2FA) renforc: Two factor authentication (2FA) strengthens access security by requiring two methods (also referred to as factors) to verify your identity. Two factor authentication protects against phishing, social engineering and password brute force attacks and secures your logins from attackers exploiting weak or stolen credentials.

Mutualisé est une association, indépenda: Mutualisé is an independant, ad-free, 100% transparent, non-lucrative association. We offer a diverse panel of collaborative tools for all kind of users, be they private individuals or professionnals
Avec le service mutualisé, nous vous pro: With shared hosting services, we can offer you collaborative and web tools to manage your data as you see fit
Nous utilisons des outils 100% logiciel: We're using 100% free software, which are able to answer to and adapt to our customers' needs
Nextcloud est un logiciel libre offrant: Nextcloud is a free software offering an advanced file-sharing platform which lets you in total control of your file sharing parameters. It presents itself as an alternative to Google Docs.
Seafile est un logiciel libre offrant un: Pydio is a free software offering a storage-service and file-sharing platform. It too presents itself as an alternative to Dropbox.
Testez nos services mutualisés pendant 3: Try our shared or dedicated services during a 30-day period with
Nous vous proposons une solution dédiée: We can offer you a dedicated plan (Nextcloud, Pydio or Seafile) hosted on VPS-type servers
A la différence du service mutualisé, le: Contrary to shared hosting services, dedicated hosting service comes with a significative performance gain, since you are alone on the server.
Cela permet d'exploiter à 100% les resso: It allows you to use 100% of the hardware's capacity and gives you a total freedom for managing your NextCloud/Pydio/Seafile instance. Increased availability for your company data.

Sauvegarde externalisée des données et r: Externalized data backup and multi-server replication
Accès aux archives via le protocole FTP/: Accessing archives via FTP/FTPS protocols (emergency connexion)
Déjà 14 années d'expérience dans la sauv: Already 14 years of experience in online data backup
Identifiez vos besoins en matière de sau: Identify your needs concerning data sharing or backup and, if you need to, contact us by mail or telephone so we can assist you and offer you the best solution regarding your needs.
WebDAV est un protocole de longue date q: WEBDAV is an old-seasoned protocol allowing web servers to act as hosting servers, and thus taking care of collaborative creation of web content. While its bested by more modern strategies, it's still a reliable tool used by many servers, clients and applications.
L’accès SSH vous permet d’accéder à une: SSH access allows you to access a SSH console directly linked to your Mutualisé account through a fully crypted and secure connexion. Authentication to this console can be done with a login/password pair or with a private key/public key pair.
Le disque ISCSI fonctionne et se comport: ISCSI disk works and acts the same way a local hard drive does : the goal of ISCSI is to have one or many hard drives on one's computer (or server) and to have the illusion they're physically connected via the motherboard. In reality, they're virtual hard drives hosted in a redudant, safe and performant infrastructure. Thus, it allows to overcome the hardware failures a machine or hard drive can experience.
Le SFTP est un protocole de communicatio: SFTP is a communication protocol taking place above SSH to remotely transfer and manage files. With SFTP, you can upload and download files and folders, and resume transfers even after interrupting them or disconnecting. You can also overwrite files without modifying the download key. Secure and crypted connexion.
L’option CIFS est un protocole TCP/IP ré: CIFS is a network TCP/IP protocol allowing to share resources and to access files using millions of computers at the same time. Users with different platforms and computers can share files without installing new software. With CFTS, modifications added to a file are simultaneously saved client-side and server-side.
Synchronise et transfert uniquement les: Synchronizes and transfers solely new files or edited files. Rsync especially allows to upload parts of a file. What it means, is that if you're working on a 300Mo file but you change only its end, Rsync will compute and send the difference only. It's thus way faster than using SFTP, which will transfer the whole file.
Le FTP/FTPS est un protocole de communic: FTP/FTPS is a communication protocol taking place above SSH to remotely transfer and manage files. With FTP/FTPS, you can upload and download files and folders, and resume transfers even after interrupting them or disconnecting. You can also overwrite files without modifying the download key. Secure and crypted connexion.

Examiner les causes de l’incident et vou: Examine the causes of the incident and inform you
Prendre les mesures nécessaires dans la: Undertake the necessary measures - within reason - to reduce the negative effects and damages that may result from said incident
En aucun cas les engagements définis au: Under no circumstances will the commitments defined in the point above relating to notification in the event of a security breach may be assimilated to any acknowledgment of fault or responsibility for the occurrence of the incident in question
Pas de transfert en dehors de l’Union eu: No transfer outside the European Union
Mutualisé s’engage à ne pas transférer l: Mutualisé undertakes not to transfer the personal data of its Users outside the European Union
En cas de modification de la présente Po: In the event of modification of this Privacy Policy, commitment not to lower the level of confidentiality in a substantial way without the prior information of the persons concerned
Nous nous engageons à vous informer en c: We undertake to inform you in the event of a substantial modification to this Privacy Policy. Confidentiality, and not to lower the level of confidentiality of your data in a substantial way without you inform and obtain your consent
Droit applicable et modalités de recours: Applicable law and terms of appeal
Application du droit français (législati: Application of French law (CNIL legislation) and jurisdiction of the courts
La présente Politique de Confidentialité: This Privacy Policy and your use of the Site shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of France, and in particular Law No. 78-17 of January 6, 1978 relating to data processing, files and freedoms. The choice of applicable law does not affect your rights as a consumer under the applicable law of your place of residence
Si vous êtes un consommateur, vous et no: If you are a consumer, you and we agree to submit to the non-exclusive jurisdiction of the courts French, which means that you can take action relating to this Privacy Policy in France or in the EU country in which you live
Si vous êtes un professionnel, toutes le: If you are a professional, all actions against us must be brought before a court in France
En cas de litige, les parties chercheron: In the event of a dispute, the parties will seek an amicable solution before any legal action. In case of failure of these attempts, any challenges to the validity, interpretation and / or execution of the Policy of Confidentiality must be brought even in the event of multiple defendants or warranty claims, before the French courts
Mutualisé s’engage à vous offrir la poss: Mutualisé undertakes to offer you the possibility of having all the data concerning you returned to you on simple request. The User is thus guaranteed better control of his data, and retains the possibility to reuse them. This data should be provided in an open and easily reusable format
